last_episode_to_air.name: Balls deep
last_episode_to_air.overview: Carlota, Rocío and Vera attempt to find and save Marcela but get themselves into a dangerous situation in the process.

name: Unstoppable
overview: A group of friends set out on a road trip when an unexpected fourth passenger forces an abrupt change of plans.

episodes.name: I want to get the f** away
episodes.overview: Rocío feels conflicted about her future in medicine and her love life. Vera's passion overwhelms her at work and Carlota defends her friend.

episodes.name: Check your privilege
episodes.overview: While on their road trip to Oaxaca, the women are taken by surprise when Marcela demands they give her a ride. Rocío's family worries about her.

episodes.name: What clashes with you keeps you in check
episodes.overview: Rocío offers to help Marcela find Joshua. Vera begins to suffer the consequences for her actions at work. Carlota is enamored with Oaxaca's art scene.

episodes.name: High school pact
episodes.overview: After the police come to their hotel, Vera's friends question what happened to her the night before. Rocío can't stop thinking about her sister.

episodes.name: First world problems
episodes.overview: A visit to Vera's vacation house brings back painful memories for her. Marcela confronts the trio about their bickering while opening up about herself.

episodes.name: Stormy ladies
episodes.overview: A tropical storm threatens to leave the ladies stranded but a generous family takes them in and gives them an unforgettable experience.

episodes.name: The sunsets I gifted my sisters
episodes.overview: With the help of special mushrooms and new friends, the ladies participate in a cosmic ritual in Puerto Escondido. Juanpi looks for Rocío.

episodes.name: Hangover is the best shortcut to failure
episodes.overview: A hungover Vera attempts to return the dresses to her former boss while Rocío learns to surf. Marcela returns home to a host of problems.

episodes.name: Accept my existence or expect resistance
episodes.overview: Juanpi and Rocío's friends look for her while she revels in her beach experience. Carlota struggles with how to cope with a devastating betrayal.

episodes.name: Balls deep
episodes.overview: Carlota, Rocío and Vera attempt to find and save Marcela but get themselves into a dangerous situation in the process.
